Posts.Content: well they want me to have a ultra sound next and I have asked for a referral to a surgeon... I went and got a copy of the report myself today and they said that since I was allergic to the contrast dye and they could not use it for the test that the results are not as good as if they had used the dye(gadolidium)sp? so anyway I think they should take a piece of it out....It hurts really bad and all along my ribs and into my chest..but my chest CT was normal and my bone scan was neg. too.... so you got me...except on my bone scan my whole sternum was really white....and they did not mention it in the report...huh... I don't know...I am a little frustrated....Thanks for listening....M
Posts.Title: Lumps in breast MRI etc

Posts.Content: Hi I have some masses in my breast and the radiologist found to large things on the MRI of the breast....they think they are just cysts...could they be cancer....I had a mass removed 14 yrs ago that was pre cancer....
